conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway: extruded walls with thickness, visible side/top faces, and an angled/isometric viewpoint exposing interior volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness and readable room volumes; cutaway is clean. Minor simplification at some wall junctions/openings.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room set and adjacency largely match (bedroom left, living center, kitchen right, toilet near top-center, utility/top-right, balcony/front-left). Some deviations in partition offsets and opening placements; proportions are close but not exact.

interior_elements.notes: Bedroom bed present; living/dining has table/sofa-like massing; kitchen counters/sink/cooktop implied; bathroom fixtures present. Some items are stylized blocks and not fully matching 2D furniture layout.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with good contrast between walls/floor and minimal artifacts; interior is visible. Window/door details are a bit indistinct due to stylization.

detected_errors.description: Minor layout/proportion drift: a few internal partitions and corridor/foyer-like areas do not align perfectly to the 2D plan dimensions.
Door/window/opening placement and sizing are simplified; not all openings clearly correspond to the 2D plan locations.
Furniture is simplified and not fully faithful to the 2D arrangement (some items represented as generic blocks).

summary: A true 3D cutaway conversion with strong volumetric fidelity and mostly correct room layout, with moderate simplification/mismatch in openings and some partition/proportion details.
